descriptor.description: Specification for a datasource

property-descriptor.name: tags
property-descriptor.label: Tags
property-descriptor.description: If set, this deployable will only be mapped automatically to containers with the same tag.

property-descriptor.name: targetRestartPolicy
property-descriptor.label: Target Restart Policy
property-descriptor.description: Indicates the policy used to stop/start the target container when resource restartTarget property is 'true' (enum)

property-descriptor.name: restartTarget
property-descriptor.label: Restart Target
property-descriptor.description: If set to true, a restart operation (stop & start) will be triggered just after the creation or the deletion of the resource (boolean)

property-descriptor.name: jndiNames
property-descriptor.label: Jndi Names
property-descriptor.description: JNDI path to where this data source is bound (string)

property-descriptor.name: url
property-descriptor.label: Url
property-descriptor.description: URL of the database to connect to. (string)

property-descriptor.name: driverName
property-descriptor.label: Driver Name
property-descriptor.description: Full package name of JDBC driver class used to create the physical database connections in the connection pool (string)

property-descriptor.name: username
property-descriptor.label: Username
property-descriptor.description: Username attribute passed to the JDBC driver when creating physical database connections (string)

property-descriptor.name: password
property-descriptor.label: Password
property-descriptor.description: Password attribute passed to the JDBC driver when creating physical database connections (string)

property-descriptor.name: JDBCConnectionPoolParams_InitialCapacity
property-descriptor.label: Initial Capacity
property-descriptor.description: Number of physical connections to create when creating the connection pool (integer)

property-descriptor.name: JDBCConnectionPoolParams_MaxCapacity
property-descriptor.label: Maximum Capacity
property-descriptor.description: Maximum number of physical connections that this connection pool can contain (integer)

property-descriptor.name: JDBCConnectionPoolParams_CapacityIncrement
property-descriptor.label: Capacity Increment
property-descriptor.description: Number of connections created when new connections are added to the connection pool (integer)

property-descriptor.name: properties
property-descriptor.label: Properties
property-descriptor.description: The map of properties passed to the JDBC driver that are used to create physical database connections (map_string_string)

property-descriptor.name: host
property-descriptor.label: Host
property-descriptor.description: Host upon which the container resides

property-descriptor.name: startScript
property-descriptor.label: Start Script
property-descriptor.description: The command to start Apache. Arguments containing spaces are not supported

property-descriptor.name: stopScript
property-descriptor.label: Stop Script
property-descriptor.description: The command to stop Apache. Arguments containing spaces are not supported

property-descriptor.name: restartScript
property-descriptor.label: Restart Script
property-descriptor.description: The command to restart or reload Apache. If left blank, the sequence 'stop, start' is used. Arguments containing spaces are not supported

property-descriptor.name: startCommand
property-descriptor.label: Start Command
property-descriptor.description: The command to start Apache. Arguments containing spaces are not supported

property-descriptor.name: startWaitTime
property-descriptor.label: Start Wait Time
property-descriptor.description: Duration (in secs) to wait after the start server step has been executed

property-descriptor.name: stopCommand
property-descriptor.label: Stop Command
property-descriptor.description: The command to stop Apache. Arguments containing spaces are not supported

property-descriptor.name: stopWaitTime
property-descriptor.label: Stop Wait Time
property-descriptor.description: Duration (in secs) to wait after the stop server step has been executed

property-descriptor.name: restartCommand
property-descriptor.label: Restart Command
property-descriptor.description: The command to restart Apache. If left blank, reload command is used. If reload command is also blank than the sequence 'stop, start' is used. Arguments containing spaces are not supported

property-descriptor.name: restartWaitTime
property-descriptor.label: Restart Wait Time
property-descriptor.description: Duration (in secs) to wait after the restart server step has been executed

property-descriptor.description: The directory into which Apache configuration files (for virtual host definitions) should be written

property-descriptor.description: The virtual host port. Use '*' to match all ports

property-descriptor.description: the servername for this virtual host

property-descriptor.name: documentRoot

property-descriptor.description: The document root for web content using this virtual host. If left blank, a directory is created in the web server's document root

property-descriptor.label: Checksum
property-descriptor.description: The checksum used to detect differences on the artifact. If not provided, it will be calculated by Deployit.

property-descriptor.description: By default, new applications and modules are configured with a Deployment Order value of 100 (integer)

property-descriptor.name: scriptRecognitionRegex
property-descriptor.label: Script Recognition Regex
property-descriptor.description: Regular expression used to identify a script in the folder. A successful match should returns a single group to which the rollbackScriptPostfix can be appended in order to find the associated rollback script or the script's dependent subfolder. e.g.([0-9]*-.*)\.sql

property-descriptor.name: rollbackScriptRecognitionRegex
property-descriptor.label: Rollback Script Recognition Regex
property-descriptor.description: Regular expression used to identify a rollback script in the folder. A successful match should returns a single group, ie the logical script name. e.g. [0-9]*-.*-rollback\.sql

property-descriptor.name: rollbackScriptPostfix
property-descriptor.label: Rollback Script Postfix
property-descriptor.description: A script's associated rollback script is derived by using the 1st group identified by the scriptRecognitionRegex and then appending this postfix to it. e.g give name '01-myscript.sql', regex '([0-9]*-.*)\.sql' and rollback script postfix '-rollback.sql', we can derive the name of the associated rollback script to be '01-myscript-rollback.sql'

property-descriptor.description: If set, the password to use. Falls back to the optional default password set on the sql.SqlClient container

property-descriptor.description: By default, new applications and modules are configured with a Deployment Order value of 100 (integer)

property-descriptor.name: placeholders
property-descriptor.label: Placeholders
property-descriptor.description: A Map containing all the placeholders mapped to their values. Special values are <ignore> or <empty>

property-descriptor.name: targetPath
property-descriptor.label: Target Path
property-descriptor.description: Path to which artifact must be copied to on the host.

property-descriptor.name: targetPathShared
property-descriptor.label: Target Path Shared
property-descriptor.description: Is the targetPath shared by others on the host. When true, the targetPath is not deleted during undeployment; only the artifacts copied to it.

property-descriptor.label: Create Target Path
property-descriptor.description: Create the targetPath on the host if it does not exist.

property-descriptor.name: targetFileName
property-descriptor.label: Target File Name
property-descriptor.description: Name of the artifact on the host.

property-descriptor.name: targetPathSharedSubDirectories
property-descriptor.label: Target Path Shared Sub Directories
property-descriptor.description: The sub directories on the target machine are not deleted if files other than that copied by Deployit are present.

descriptor.description: Email Action

property-descriptor.name: toAddresses
property-descriptor.label: To Addresses
property-descriptor.description: Mail addresses of recepients.

property-descriptor.name: fromAddress
property-descriptor.label: From Address
property-descriptor.description: From mail address. Defaults to SMTPServer fromAddress.

property-descriptor.name: subject
property-descriptor.label: Subject
property-descriptor.description: Mail subject

property-descriptor.name: sendContentAsHtml
property-descriptor.label: Send Content As Html
property-descriptor.description: Mail body content should be sent as HTML

property-descriptor.name: body
property-descriptor.label: Body
property-descriptor.description: Mail body content in the form of a Freemarker template.

property-descriptor.name: bodyTemplatePath
property-descriptor.label: Body Template Path
property-descriptor.description: Freemarker template used to render mail body content. Path can be absolute or relative to Deployit's classpath.

property-descriptor.name: mailServer
property-descriptor.label: Mail Server
property-descriptor.description: The mail server used to send the email.

descriptor.description: Defines actions to executed for the specified state transition of a Step.

property-descriptor.name: actions
property-descriptor.label: Actions
property-descriptor.description: Actions to execute when specified state transition occurs.

property-descriptor.name: fromState
property-descriptor.label: From State
property-descriptor.description: Trigger actions when the Step transitions from this state.

property-descriptor.name: toState
property-descriptor.label: To State
property-descriptor.description: Trigger actions when the Step transitions to this state.

descriptor.description: A single file artifact that can be packaged in a Deployment Package

property-descriptor.name: tags
property-descriptor.label: Tags
property-descriptor.description: If set, this deployable will only be mapped automatically to containers with the same tag.

property-descriptor.name: scanPlaceholders
property-descriptor.label: Scan Placeholders
property-descriptor.description: Whether to scan this artifact for placeholders when it is imported

property-descriptor.name: placeholders
property-descriptor.label: Placeholders
property-descriptor.description: Placeholders detected in this artifact

property-descriptor.name: delimiters
property-descriptor.label: Delimiters
property-descriptor.description: The delimiters used indicate placeholders, defaults to '{{ }}'. This is a 5 character string with a space in the middle, the first two are the leading delimiter, the last two are the closing delimiter

property-descriptor.name: textFileNamesRegex
property-descriptor.label: Text File Names Regex
property-descriptor.description: Regular expression that matches file names of text files
property-descriptor.default: .+\.(cfg | conf | config | ini | properties | props | txt | asp | aspx | htm | html | jsf | jsp | xht | xhtml | sql | xml | xsd | xsl | xslt)

property-descriptor.name: excludeFileNamesRegex
property-descriptor.label: Exclude File Names Regex
property-descriptor.description: Regular expression that matches file names that must be excluded from scanning

property-descriptor.name: checksum
property-descriptor.label: Checksum
property-descriptor.description: The checksum used to detect differences on the artifact. If not provided, it will be calculated by Deployit.

property-descriptor.name: targetPath
property-descriptor.label: Target Path
property-descriptor.description: Path to which artifact must be copied to when being deployed.

property-descriptor.name: targetPathShared
property-descriptor.label: Target Path Shared
property-descriptor.description: Is the targetPath shared by others on the host. When true, the targetPath is not deleted during undeployment; only the artifacts copied to it.

property-descriptor.name: createTargetPath
property-descriptor.label: Create Target Path
property-descriptor.description: Create the targetPath on the host if it does not exist.

property-descriptor.name: targetFileName
property-descriptor.label: Target File Name
property-descriptor.description: Name of the artifact on the host.

property-descriptor.description: The command to restart or reload Apache. If left blank, the sequence 'stop, start' is used. Arguments containing spaces are not supported

property-descriptor.label: Start Command
property-descriptor.description: The command to start Apache. Arguments containing spaces are not supported

property-descriptor.name: startWaitTime
property-descriptor.label: Start Wait Time
property-descriptor.description: Duration (in secs) to wait after the start server step has been executed

property-descriptor.name: stopCommand
property-descriptor.label: Stop Command
property-descriptor.description: The command to stop Apache. Arguments containing spaces are not supported

property-descriptor.name: stopWaitTime
property-descriptor.label: Stop Wait Time
property-descriptor.description: Duration (in secs) to wait after the stop server step has been executed

property-descriptor.name: restartCommand
property-descriptor.label: Restart Command
property-descriptor.description: The command to restart Apache. If left blank, reload command is used. If reload command is also blank than the sequence 'stop, start' is used. Arguments containing spaces are not supported

property-descriptor.name: restartWaitTime
property-descriptor.label: Restart Wait Time
property-descriptor.description: Duration (in secs) to wait after the restart server step has been executed

property-descriptor.name: defaultDocumentRoot
property-descriptor.label: Default Document Root
property-descriptor.description: The directory in which document roots for virtual hosts should be created. Web content deployed without a virtual host will also be copied into this directory

property-descriptor.description: The directory into which Apache configuration files (for virtual host definitions) should be written

property-descriptor.name: sitesEnabledDirectory
property-descriptor.label: Sites Enabled Directory
property-descriptor.description: The directory into which Apache vhost configuration files (for virtual host definitions) should be written

property-descriptor.label: Port
property-descriptor.description: The virtual host port. Use '*' to match all ports

property-descriptor.name: serverName
property-descriptor.label: Server Name
property-descriptor.description: the servername for this virtual host

property-descriptor.name: documentRoot
property-descriptor.label: Document Root
property-descriptor.description: The document root for web content using this virtual host. If left blank, a directory is created in the web server's document root

property-descriptor.label: Target Directory
property-descriptor.description: Target directory name
